title: Prismatica v1.2
description:
Prismatica is a puzzle game with a brand new twist, inspired by Rubikâ€™s Cubes, Sudoku, Dodecahedrons and way, way too much caffeine.

The goal is to unscramble a series of puzzle boards by rotating multicolored pieces to match a logical pattern. Itâ€™s easy to learn and simple to play but surprisingly deep and difficult to master at later levels, presenting even the most veteran of puzzle enthusiasts with brain-tickling challenge.

Prismatica's aesthetic design and feel is intended to be calm and essentialist, presenting the player with a pure puzzle to focus on solving in a flowing natural way. A hauntingly beautiful soundtrack from award winning indie folk musician Svavar Knutur reinforces the stoic atmosphere of contemplation and mental challenge presented by the deceptively simple looking puzzles
